name: .QIT File Extension
summary: Learn about .QIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Trojan horse file used to infect computers and execute malicious program code; contains executable content that allows hackers to gain full control over a computer; used for various malicious purposes.

content: A common alias associated with QIT trojans is Backdoor.QIT. QIT files may may have various filename prefixes.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
